name: Eye of Perception
r1: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12s.
r2: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 270% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 11s.
r3: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 300% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 10s.
r4: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 330% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 9s.
r5: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 8s.
